show.subtitle: Psychiatrist Peter R. Breggin, MD believes you can make a marvelous life.  Great guests, callers and conversations to inspire you.
show.title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour

title: The Dr. Peter Breggin Hour
content: My guest is Alison Bass, author of Side Effects, and a genuine investigative journalist.  A very informed discussion of... <!--more--> what I call the Psychopharmaceutical Complex.   Hear how bad it is, and some differing possible solutions offered by me and Alison.  Many  new information and insights into the rigging of psychopharmaceutical research and marketing.
